title: President Nicolás Maduro congratulates OPEC Secretary General Mohammad Sanusi Barkindo
description: Vienna, Austria, 20 January 2022--President Nicolás Maduro of the Bolivarian Republic of Venezuela paid glowing tribute to OPEC Secretary General, HE Mohammad Sanusi Barkindo, for a very successful two-term tenure which comes to an end in August 2022. The President was addressing the nationâ€™s Parliament during the State of the Nation address in Caracas on Wednesday, 19 January 2022.
